conversation.content: Hola, quick question—I need to speak with a human about a payment that keeps failing for my flight.
Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! How can I help you today?
I’d like to be transferred to a real person. The website keeps declining my card and I don’t know why.
Absolutely, I can get you to a specialist. I’ll just need a few quick details before I connect you. May I have your full name, please?
Thanks, Daniel. Could you please provide your phone number? If you’ve used a different one on your Stratos Rewards account, that’s fine—no need to verify anything right now.
Got it—415-555-2198. Could you please provide your email address so the specialist can follow up if needed?
Thank you. And just to clarify the reason for the transfer: is this a payment issue on a new booking or on an existing reservation? If it’s an existing one, do you have your reservation or PNR handy?
It’s a new booking—no PNR yet. The site declines my card at checkout.

Understood—new booking with a payment failure at checkout. I’ll summarize your details and connect you to a Celestar Air specialist who can securely process payment and troubleshoot the decline. One moment please.
Before you transfer, do you need anything else from me?

You’re all set. I have your name as Daniel Reyes, phone number 415-555-2198, email daniel.reyes84@gmail.com, and reason: payment failure on a new booking, no PNR yet. I’ll connect you with a Celestar Air specialist. One moment please.
You’re welcome. Transferring you now—please stay on the line.

mistakes.evidence: “no need to verify anything right now.”
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Performed account-specific actions without verifying the caller’s identity by explicitly stating no verification is needed.
